definition.name: NXaperture
definition.doc: Draft extension of NXaperture to describe apertures in electron analysers.

field.name: shape
field.doc: Shape of the aperture, i.e. straight or curved for slits, circle, square hexagon, octagon, bladed for pinholes and irises.

field.name: size
field.doc: The relevant dimension for the aperture, i.e. slit width, pinhole and iris diameter
